text: Fǎlǎo shuō:“Zài wǒ yǔnxǔ nǐmen zhīqián, nǐmen jiù xìnfèng tāle ma? Tā bìdìng shì nǐmen de tóuzi, tā bǎ móshù chuánshòu gěi nǐmen, suǒyǐ wǒ shì bì jiāohùzhe kǎn diào nǐmen de shǒu hé jiǎo, wǒ shì bì bǎ nǐmen dīng sǐ zài yē zǎo shù shàng, nǐmen bìdìng zhīdào wǒ liǎ shéi de xíngfá gèng yánlì, gèng chángjiǔ.”
